exercises.title: The Basic Exercise
exercises.description: Perfect introduction to nervous system regulation. Learn foundational techniques to calm your nervous system and build resilience.
steps: Find a comfortable seated position
Close your eyes and breathe naturally
Notice your breath without changing it
Place one hand on chest, one on belly
Breathe in for 4 counts
Hold for 4 counts
Exhale for 4 counts
Repeat this cycle mindfully

exercises.title: Neck & Shoulder Release
exercises.description: Gentle movements to release tension accumulated in the neck and shoulders from daily stress.
steps: Sit tall with feet flat on floor
Slowly roll shoulders backward 5 times
Gently tilt head to right, hold 10 seconds
Return to center, tilt to left, hold 10 seconds
Look down, stretching back of neck
Slowly roll head in half circles
Finish with deep shoulder shrugs

exercises.title: Progressive Muscle Relaxation
exercises.description: Systematically tense and release muscle groups to achieve deep physical and mental relaxation.
steps: Lie down comfortably on your back
Start with your toes - tense for 5 seconds, then release
Move to your calves - tense and release
Continue with thighs, glutes, abdomen
Tense your hands into fists, then release
Tense your arms, shoulders, and neck
Scrunch your face muscles, then release
Take three deep breaths and notice the relaxation

exercises.title: Humming Meditation
exercises.description: Use the power of vocal vibrations to stimulate the vagus nerve and promote calm.

slides.title: Prepare Your Space
slides.text: Find a quiet, comfortable place to sit. Close your eyes and take three deep breaths.

slides.title: Begin Humming
slides.text: Take a deep breath and on the exhale, create a gentle 'mmm' sound. Feel the vibration in your chest.

slides.title: Focus on Vibration
slides.text: Continue humming for 30 seconds at a time. Notice the soothing vibrations throughout your body.

slides.title: Complete the Practice
slides.text: End with three normal breaths. Notice the sense of calm and centeredness you've created.

exercises.title: Cold Water Breathing
exercises.description: Combine breath work with cold exposure techniques to strengthen vagus nerve function.

exercises.title: Therapeutic Gargling
exercises.description: Simple gargling techniques to activate the vagus nerve and improve vagal tone.

exercises.title: Yoga Nidra Deep Rest
exercises.description: Enter a state of conscious deep sleep for profound restoration and nervous system reset.

exercises.title: Full Body Scan
exercises.description: Systematic body awareness practice for deep relaxation and nervous system restoration.

exercises.title: Restorative Breathing
exercises.description: Slow, deep breathing patterns designed to activate the parasympathetic nervous system.

exercises.title: Gentle Spinal Waves
exercises.description: Fluid spinal movements to release tension and improve nervous system communication.
